Android.Description: Reference for the Android section of the Unreal Engine Project Settings.

Settings.Name: Android Package Name
Settings.Description: Official product name for Play Store, format 'com.Company.Project'. Must be unique and have at least 2 sections separated by a period.

Settings.Name: Store Version
Settings.Description: Version number for store, range 1-2147483647.

Settings.Name: Store Version Offset
Settings.Description: Offsets for different architectures: ARMv7, ARM64, x86_64.

Settings.Name: Application Display Name
Settings.Description: App name for end users; uses project name if blank.

Settings.Name: Version Display Name
Settings.Description: Version for end users, usually x.y.

Settings.Name: Minimum SDK Version
Settings.Description: Minimum Android version (19=KitKat, 21=Lollipop) for installation.

Settings.Name: Target SDK Version
Settings.Description: Target Android version for running the app.

Settings.Name: Install Location
Settings.Description: Preferred install location: Internal Only, Prefer External, Auto.

Settings.Name: Enable Lint Depreciation Checks
Settings.Description: Enable -Xlint:unchecked and -Clint:depreciation for Java compiling (Gradle only).

Settings.Name: Package Game Data Inside .apk
Settings.Description: Whether to place data inside .apk instead of a separate .obb file. Necessary for Amazon but not Google Play.

Settings.Name: Generate Install Files for All Platforms
Settings.Description: Generate batch (.bat) and shell script (.command) files for all platforms.

Settings.Name: Disable .obb Verification
Settings.Description: Disable verification of .obb file on first start or update.

Settings.Name: Force Small .obb Files
Settings.Description: Limit .obb file size to 1 GB.

Settings.Name: Allow Large .obb Files
Settings.Description: Allow .obb files up to 4 GB (Google Play limit is 2 GB).

Settings.Name: Allow Patch .obb File
Settings.Description: Generate a patch .obb for overflow content.

Settings.Name: Allow Overflow .obb Files
Settings.Description: Generate up to two overflow .obb files.

Settings.Name: Use ExternalFilesDir for UnrealGame Files
Settings.Description: Place UnrealGame files in ExternalFilesDir, removed on uninstall.

Settings.Name: Make Log Files Always Publicly Accessible
Settings.Description: Log files in a public directory; may require WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.

Settings.Name: Orientation
Settings.Description: Application orientation: Portrait, Reverse Portrait, Sensor Portrait, Landscape, Reverse Landscape, Sensor Landscape, Sensor, Full Sensor.

Settings.Name: Maximum Supported Aspect Ratio
Settings.Description: Max aspect ratio (width/height).

Settings.Name: Use Display Cutout Region
Settings.Description: Use display cutout area on Android 9+.

Settings.Name: Restore Scheduled Notifications on Reboot
Settings.Description: Restore scheduled local notifications on reboot.

Settings.Name: Enable Full Screen Immersive on KitKat and Above Devices
Settings.Description: Hide software navigation buttons.

Settings.Name: Enable Improved Virtual Keyboard
Settings.Description: Edit text field directly.

Settings.Name: Preferred Depth Buffer Format
Settings.Description: Preferred depth buffer bitcount: Default, 16-bit, 24-bit, 32-bit.

Settings.Name: Validate Texture Formats
Settings.Description: Verify support for cooked texture formats at runtime.

Settings.Name: Force Gradle to Compress Native Libs
Settings.Description: Force Gradle to compress native libs for MinSDKVersion >= 23.

Settings.Name: Enable Compression of Relocation Tables
Settings.Description: Generate Android binary with RELR and APS2 relocation tables for MinSDKVersion >= 28.

Settings.Name: Status of Platform Setup File
Settings.Description: Shows project configuration status for Android platform.

Settings.Name: Accept SDK License
Settings.Description: Accept SDK license agreement for Gradle.

Settings.Name: Build Folder
Settings.Description: Folder containing build files, recommended to check into source control.

Settings.Name: Generate Bundle (AAB)
Settings.Description: Generate an AAB bundle.

Settings.Name: Generate Universal .apk from Bundle
Settings.Description: Generate a universal .apk from bundle.

Settings.Name: Enable ABI Split
Settings.Description: Separate ABIs into their own .apk files.

Settings.Name: Enable Language Split
Settings.Description: Separate resources by language into their own .apk.

Settings.Name: Enable Density Split
Settings.Description: Separate resources by density into their own .apk.

Settings.Name: Support OpenGL ES3.2
Settings.Description: Include shaders for devices supporting OpenGL ES 3.2+.

Settings.Name: Support Vulkan
Settings.Description: Support Vulkan RHI and include Vulkan shaders.

Settings.Name: Support Vulkan Desktop / SM5
Settings.Description: Enable Vulkan SM5 rendering support.

Settings.Name: Debug Vulkan Layer Directory
Settings.Description: Directory for Debug Vulkan Layers to package.

Settings.Name: Debug Vulkan Device Layers
Settings.Description: Debug Vulkan Device Layers to enable.

Settings.Name: Debug Vulkan Instance Layers
Settings.Description: Debug Vulkan Instance Layers to enable.

Settings.Name: Support Backbuffer Sampling on OpenGL
Settings.Description: Render to offscreen surface for UMG background blur support.

Settings.Name: Support ARM64
Settings.Description: Support ARM64 CPU architecture.

Settings.Name: Support x86_64
Settings.Description: Support x86_64 architecture.

Settings.Name: Detect Vulkan Device Support
Settings.Description: Detect Vulkan device support by default.

Settings.Name: Advanced APK Packaging
Settings.Description: Additional tags and settings for nodes and sections.

Settings.Name: Extra Permissions
Settings.Description: Add extra permissions (e.g., 'android.permission.INTERNET').

Settings.Name: Package for Oculus Mobile Device
Settings.Description: Package for Oculus Mobile device.

Settings.Name: Remove Oculus Signature Files
Settings.Description: Remove Oculus Signature Files (.osig) from .apk.

Settings.Name: Key Store
Settings.Description: File output by keytool, specified with -keystore.

Settings.Name: Key Alias
Settings.Description: Name of the key specified with -alias.

Settings.Name: Key Store Password
Settings.Description: Password specified for keystore.

Settings.Name: Key Password
Settings.Description: Password for the key, same as keystore if left blank.

Settings.Name: Google Play Services
Settings.Description: Settings for Google Play services integration.

Settings.Name: Enable Google Play Support
Settings.Description: Enable Google Play support.

Settings.Name: Default Icon
Settings.Description: Default app icon.

Settings.Name: LDPI Icon
Settings.Description: Icon for low-density screens.

Settings.Name: MDPI Icon
Settings.Description: Icon for medium-density screens.

Settings.Name: HDPI Icon
Settings.Description: Icon for high-density screens.

Settings.Name: XHDPI Icon
Settings.Description: Icon for extra-high-density screens.

Settings.Name: Show Launch Image
Settings.Description: Show image as startup splash screen.

Settings.Name: Download Background Image
Settings.Description: Background image for downloading OBB files.

Settings.Name: Launch Portrait
Settings.Description: Splash screen for portrait orientations.

Settings.Name: Launch Landscape
Settings.Description: Splash screen for landscape orientations.

Settings.Name: Enable Mali Perf Counters
Settings.Description: Disable security.perf_harden for performance counters on Mali devices.

Settings.Name: Android Graphics Debugger
Settings.Description: Configure project for different graphics debuggers.

Settings.Name: Allow IMU Sampling
Settings.Description: Enable accelerometer, magnetometer, and gyroscope events.

Settings.Name: Allow Bluetooth Controllers
Settings.Description: Enable input from Bluetooth controllers.

Settings.Name: Block Android System Keys
Settings.Description: Prevent controllers from sending Android_Back and Android_Menu events.

Settings.Name: Block Force Feedback
Settings.Description: Block force feedback when controllers are attached.

Settings.Name: Encoding Format
Settings.Description: Audio encoding options: Default, Ogg Vorbis, ADCPM.

Settings.Name: Audio Mixer Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Sample rate for the audio mixer.

Settings.Name: Callback Buffer Size
Settings.Description: Amount of audio to compute per callback.

Settings.Name: Number of Buffers To Enqueue
Settings.Description: Number of buffers to keep enqueued.

Settings.Name: Max Channels
Settings.Description: Maximum number of audio channels.

Settings.Name: Number of Source Workers
Settings.Description: Number of workers for source audio computation.

Settings.Name: Compression Overrides
Settings.Description: Settings for audio compression overrides.

Settings.Name: Cook Overrides
Settings.Description: Settings for audio cook overrides.

Settings.Name: Spatialization Plugin
Settings.Description: Spatialization plugin to use.

Settings.Name: Reverb Plugin
Settings.Description: Reverb plugin to use.

Settings.Name: Occlusion Plugin
Settings.Description: Occlusion plugin to use.

Settings.Name: Sound Cue Cook Quality
Settings.Description: Quality level to cook SoundCues at.

Settings.Name: Include ETC2 Textures
Settings.Description: Include ETC2 textures when packaging with Android (Multi) variant.

Settings.Name: Include DXT Textures
Settings.Description: Include DXT textures when packaging with Android (Multi) variant.

Settings.Name: Include ASTC Textures
Settings.Description: Include ASTC textures when packaging with Android (Multi) variant.

Settings.Name: Texture Format Priorities
Settings.Description: Prioritize texture formats: ETC2, DXT, ASTC.

Settings.Name: Stream landscape visual mesh LODs
Settings.Description: Enable LOD streaming for landscape visual meshes.

Settings.Name: Enable DOM storage for WebViews
Settings.Description: Enable DOM storage API for WebViews.

Android Material Quality - ES31.Description: Reference for the Android Material Quality - ES31 section of the Unreal Engine Project Settings.

Settings.Name: Discard Quality During Cook
Settings.Description: Discard quality during cook.

Settings.Name: Enable Quality Override
Settings.Description: Enable quality override.

Settings.Name: Force Fully Rough
Settings.Description: Force Roughness input to 1 to improve performance.

Settings.Name: Force Non-Metal
Settings.Description: Force Metallic input to 0 to improve performance.

Settings.Name: Disable Lightmap Directionality
Settings.Description: Disable lightmap directionality.

Settings.Name: Force Low Quality Reflections
Settings.Description: Force low quality reflections.

Settings.Name: Force Not Use Pre-Integrated GF for Simple IBL
Settings.Description: Force not use pre-integrated GF for simple IBL.

Settings.Name: Disable Material Normal Calculation
Settings.Description: Disable material normal calculation.

Settings.Name: Mobile Shadow Mapping Quality
Settings.Description: Set mobile shadow mapping quality.

Settings.Name: Update Preview Shaders
Settings.Description: Update editor to reflect changes to quality settings.

Android SDK.Description: Reference for the Android SDK section of the Unreal Engine Project Settings.

Settings.Name: Location of Android SDK
Settings.Description: On-disk location of Android SDK; falls back to ANDROID_HOME environment variable if blank.

Settings.Name: Location of Android NDK
Settings.Description: On-disk location of Android NDK; falls back to NDKROOT environment variable if blank.

Settings.Name: Location of JAVA
Settings.Description: On-disk location of Java; falls back to JAVA_HOME environment variable if blank.

Settings.Name: SDK API Level
Settings.Description: Define which SDK to package and compile Java with: specific version, latest, or matchndk.

Settings.Name: NDK API Level
Settings.Description: Define which NDK to compile with: specific version or latest. Choosing android-21 or later excludes pre-5.0 devices.

iOS.Description: Reference for the iOS section of the Unreal Engine Project Settings.

Mobile Provision.Description: Override default provisioning profiles and certificates.

Settings.Name: Import Provision
Settings.Description: Select provisioning profiles for your application.

Settings.Name: Import Certificate
Settings.Description: Select the certificate for your application.

Bundle Information.Description: Settings for Info.plist file generated during build.

Settings.Name: Bundle Display Name
Settings.Description: Display name for the application under the icon.

Settings.Name: Bundle Name
Settings.Description: Short name for the application bundle.

Settings.Name: Bundle Identifier
Settings.Description: Unique identifier for your app in the App Store.

Settings.Name: Version Info
Settings.Description: Version of the application.

Settings.Name: Supports Portrait Orientation
Settings.Description: Support default portrait orientation.

Settings.Name: Supports Upside Down Orientation
Settings.Description: Support upside-down orientation.

Settings.Name: Supports Landscape Left Orientation
Settings.Description: Support left landscape orientation.

Settings.Name: Supports Landscape Right Orientation
Settings.Description: Support right landscape orientation.

Settings.Name: Preferred Landscape Orientation
Settings.Description: Initial orientation at launch: Landscape (left or right Home button).

Settings.Name: Multiple Gamepads
Settings.Description: Allow multiple gamepads simultaneously.

Settings.Name: AppleTV Remote Landscape Mode
Settings.Description: Enable Siri Remote landscape mode.

Settings.Name: AppleTV Remote Absolute Trackpad Values
Settings.Description: Center of trackpad is 0,0 for virtual joystick.

Settings.Name: Allow MFi Controllers
Settings.Description: Enable Bluetooth connected controllers.

Settings.Name: Block Force Feedback
Settings.Description: Block force feedback when controllers are attached.

Settings.Name: Disable Motion Controls
Settings.Description: Disable device motion data.

Settings.Name: Use Integrated Keyboard
Settings.Description: Use keyboard without UITextField.

Settings.Name: Support iTunes File Sharing
Settings.Description: Enable iTunes File Sharing.

Settings.Name: Support Files App
Settings.Description: Enable access from Files app (requires iTunes File Sharing).

Settings.Name: Use Fast-Math Intrinsics
Settings.Description: Enable Metal shading language's 'fast' intrinsics.

Settings.Name: Force 32-bit Floating Point Precision
Settings.Description: Force Metal shaders to use 32-bit precision.

Settings.Name: Enable Fast-Math Optimizations
Settings.Description: Enable Metal shader-compiler's -ffast-math optimizations.

Settings.Name: Tier of Indirect Argument Buffers
Settings.Description: Compile shaders using a tier Indirect Argument Buffers.

Settings.Name: Support Apple A8
Settings.Description: Enable support for Apple A8 devices.

Settings.Name: Metal Mobile Renderer
Settings.Description: Compile iOS Metal shaders for the Mobile renderer.

Settings.Name: Metal Desktop Renderer
Settings.Description: Compile iOS Metal shaders for the desktop renderer.

Settings.Name: Metal Shader Standard To Target
Settings.Description: Choose Metal shader language version: v2.3 or v2.4.

Settings.Name: Minimum iOS Version
Settings.Description: Minimum iOS version supported: 14.0 or 15.0.

Settings.Name: Frame Rate Lock
Settings.Description: Set max frame rate: None, 20 FPS, 30 FPS, or 60 FPS.

Settings.Name: Enable Dynamic Max FPS
Settings.Description: Use device MaxRefreshRate instead of a constant.

Settings.Name: Supports iPad
Settings.Description: Add support for iPad devices.

Settings.Name: Supports iPhone
Settings.Description: Add support for iPhone devices.

Build.Description: Build settings for the iOS project.

Settings.Name: Build Project as a Framework
Settings.Description: Build the iOS project as a framework.

Settings.Name: Override Location of Metal Toolchain
Settings.Description: Override default install location of Metal developer tools for Windows.

Settings.Name: Generate dSYMs for Debugging
Settings.Description: Generate dSYM file for debugging and profiling.

Settings.Name: Generate dSYMs as a Bundle
Settings.Description: Generate dSYM bundle for third-party crash tools.

Settings.Name: Generate .udebugsymbols File
Settings.Description: Generate .udebugsymbols file for offline symbolication.

Settings.Name: Generate Xcode Archive Package
Settings.Description: Generate Xcode archive package.

Settings.Name: Support Bitcode in Shipping
Settings.Description: Enable Bitcode compiling.

Settings.Name: Enable Advertising Identifier (IDFA)
Settings.Description: Enable Advertising Identifier.

Settings.Name: Additional Non-Shipping Linker Flags
Settings.Description: Additional linker flags for non-shipping builds.

Settings.Name: Additional Shipping Linker Flags
Settings.Description: Additional linker flags for shipping builds.

Settings.Name: Override Existing SSH Permissions File
Settings.Description: Path of the SSH permissions key for remote server connection.

Settings.Name: Support User Switching on tvOS
Settings.Description: Enable Multi-User feature on tvOS.

Settings.Name: Dev Center Username
Settings.Description: Username for DevCenter login with Turnkey.

Settings.Name: Dev Center Password
Settings.Description: Password for DevCenter login with Turnkey.

Settings.Name: Remote Server Name
Settings.Description: Name or IP address of the remote Mac for builds.

Settings.Name: RSync User Name
Settings.Description: Username for RSync on the remote server.

Settings.Name: Remote Server Override Build Path
Settings.Description: Optional path on the remote Mac for build files.

Settings.Name: Found Existing SSH Permissions File
Settings.Description: Location of an existing SSH key found by Unreal Engine.

Settings.Name: Cw Rsync Install Path
Settings.Description: Install directory of cwRsync.

Settings.Name: Generate SSH Key
Settings.Description: Generate the SSH key.

Settings.Name: Enable Game Center Support
Settings.Description: Enable Game Center support.

Settings.Name: Enable Cloud Kit Support
Settings.Description: Enable Cloud Kit support.

Settings.Name: iCloud Save Files Sync Strategy
Settings.Description: Strategy for reading from iCloud save files.

Settings.Name: Enable Background Fetch
Settings.Description: Enable background fetch support.

Settings.Name: Enable Facebook Support
Settings.Description: Enable Facebook support.

Settings.Name: Facebook App ID
Settings.Description: Facebook App ID from Facebook Developer Center.

Settings.Name: Allow Web Connections to Non-HTTPS Websites
Settings.Description: Allow connections to non-HTTPS websites.

Settings.Name: Enable Remote Notifications Support
Settings.Description: Enable remote notifications support.

Settings.Name: Additional Plist Data
Settings.Description: Add additional plist data; separate lines with \n.

Settings.Name: Marketing Icon (1024x1024)
Settings.Description: Icon for App Store (1024x1024px).

Settings.Name: Default iPhone Icon (120x120)
Settings.Description: Default icon for iPhone (120x120px).

Settings.Name: Default iPad Icon (152x152)
Settings.Description: Default icon for iPad (152x152px).

Settings.Name: iPad Pro Retina App Icon (167x167)
Settings.Description: High-resolution icon for iPad Pro Retina (167x167px).

Settings.Name: 3x iPhone App Icon (180x180)
Settings.Description: 3x iPhone App Icon (180x180).

Settings.Name: 3x iPhone Spotlight Icon (120x120)
Settings.Description: 3x iPhone Spotlight Icon (120x120).

Settings.Name: Default Spotlight Icon (80x80)
Settings.Description: Default Spotlight Icon (80x80).

Settings.Name: 3x iPhone Settings Icon (87x87)
Settings.Description: 3x iPhone Settings Icon (87x87).

Settings.Name: Default Settings Icon (58x58)
Settings.Description: Default Settings Icon (58x58).

Settings.Name: 3x iPhone Notification Icon (60x60)
Settings.Description: 3x iPhone Notification Icon (60x60).

Settings.Name: Default Notification Icon (40x40)
Settings.Description: Default Notification Icon (40x40).

Settings.Name: Custom Launchscreen Storyboard
Settings.Description: Use a custom LaunchScreen storyboard.

Settings.Name: Launch Screen Image
Settings.Description: Image for Launch Screen when custom storyboard is not used.

Settings.Name: Icon Large Back (1280x768)
Settings.Description: Large back icon (1280x768).

Settings.Name: Icon Large Front (1280x768)
Settings.Description: Large front icon (1280x768).

Settings.Name: Icon Large Middle (1280x768)
Settings.Description: Large middle icon (1280x768).

Settings.Name: Icon Small Back (400x240)
Settings.Description: Small back icon (400x240).

Settings.Name: Icon Small Front (400x240)
Settings.Description: Small front icon (400x240).

Settings.Name: Icon Small Middle (400x240)
Settings.Description: Small middle icon (400x240).

Settings.Name: Top Shelf (1920x720)
Settings.Description: Top shelf icon (1920x720).

Settings.Name: Top Shelf (6840x1440)
Settings.Description: Top shelf icon (6840x1440).

Settings.Name: Top Shelf Wide (2320x720)
Settings.Description: Top shelf wide icon (2320x720).

Settings.Name: 2x Top Shelf Wide (4640x1440)
Settings.Description: 2x top shelf wide icon (4640x1440).

Settings.Name: Audio Mixer Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Sample rate for the audio mixer.

Settings.Name: Callback Buffer Size
Settings.Description: Amount of audio to compute per callback.

Settings.Name: Number of Buffers To Enqueue
Settings.Description: Number of buffers to keep enqueued.

Settings.Name: Max Channels
Settings.Description: Maximum number of audio channels.

Settings.Name: Number of Source Workers
Settings.Description: Number of workers for source audio computation.

Settings.Name: Compression Overrides
Settings.Description: Settings for audio compression overrides.

Settings.Name: Cook Overrides
Settings.Description: Settings for audio cook overrides.

Settings.Name: Spatialization Plugin
Settings.Description: Choose spatialization plugin: Built-In, Resonance Audio, Other.

Settings.Name: Reverb Plugin
Settings.Description: Choose reverb plugin: Built-In, Resonance Audio, Other.

Settings.Name: Occlusion Plugin
Settings.Description: Choose occlusion plugin: Built-In, Other.

Settings.Name: Sound Cue Cook Quality
Settings.Description: Quality level to cook SoundCues at.

Settings.Name: Override Compression Times
Settings.Description: Override Sound Group compression times.

Settings.Name: Duration Threshold
Settings.Description: Fully decompress sounds under this threshold.

Settings.Name: Maximum Branches on Random SoundCue Nodes
Settings.Description: Preload only this number of branches on random Sound Cues.

Settings.Name: Quality Index for Sound Cues
Settings.Description: Override quality index for Sound Cues.

Settings.Name: Resample for Device
Settings.Description: Enable audio resampling for this platform.

Settings.Name: Compression Quality Modifier
Settings.Description: Scale all compression qualities for this platform.

Settings.Name: Stream Caching
Settings.Description: Settings for stream caching.

Settings.Name: Resampling Quality
Settings.Description: Settings for resampling quality.

Settings.Name: Max Cache Size (KB)
Settings.Description: Max memory for audio cache.

Settings.Name: Max Chunk Size Override (KB)
Settings.Description: Override max chunk size for stream caching.

Settings.Name: Max Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Maximum sample rate for resampling.

Settings.Name: High Sample Rate
Settings.Description: High sample rate for resampling.

Settings.Name: Medium Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Medium sample rate for resampling.

Settings.Name: Low Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Low sample rate for resampling.

Settings.Name: Min Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Minimum sample rate for resampling.

Settings.Name: Stream Landscape Visual Mesh LODs
Settings.Description: Enable LOD streaming for landscape visual meshes.

Settings.Description: Game Icon.

Settings.Name: Spatialization Plugin
Settings.Description: Defines which spatialization plugin to use: Built-In, Resonance Audio, Other.

Settings.Name: Reverb Plugin
Settings.Description: Defines which reverb plugin to use: Built-In, Resonance Audio, Other.

Settings.Name: Occlusion Plugin
Settings.Description: Defines which occlusion plugin to use: Built-In, Other.

Settings.Name: Sound Cue Cook Quality
Settings.Description: Quality level to cook SoundCues at.

Developer Resources.Forums: Ask questions and help your peers in the Developer Forums.
Developer Resources.Learning Library: Write your own tutorials or read those from others in the Learning Library.

Windows.Description: Reference for the Windows section of the Unreal Engine Project Settings.

Settings.Name: Default RHI
Settings.Description: Select the Rendering Hardware Interface (RHI) to use: Default, DirectX 11, DirectX 12, Vulkan.

Settings.Name: DirectX 11 & 12 (SM5)
Settings.Description: Enable DirectX 11 and 12 as targeted RHIs.

Settings.Name: DirectX 12 (SM6, Experimental)
Settings.Description: Enable DirectX 12 as the targeted RHI.

Settings.Name: Vulkan (SM5)
Settings.Description: Enable Vulkan as the targeted RHI.

Settings.Name: DirectX Mobile Emulation
Settings.Description: Enable DirectX Mobile Emulation as the targeted RHI.

Settings.Name: Compiler Version
Settings.Description: Select the compiler version: Default, Visual Studio 2015 (deprecated), Visual Studio 2017, Visual Studio 2019, Visual Studio 2022.

Settings.Name: Editor Splash
Settings.Description: Editor Splash.

Settings.Name: Game Splash
Settings.Description: Game Splash.

Settings.Name: Game Icon
Settings.Description: Game Icon.

Settings.Name: Audio Mixer Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Sample rate for the audio mixer.

Settings.Name: Callback Buffer Size
Settings.Description: Amount of audio to compute per callback.

Settings.Name: Number of Buffers To Enqueue
Settings.Description: Number of buffers to keep enqueued.

Settings.Name: Max Channels
Settings.Description: Maximum number of audio channels.

Settings.Name: Number of Source Workers
Settings.Description: Number of workers for source audio computation.

Settings.Name: Compression Overrides
Settings.Description: Settings for audio compression overrides.

Settings.Name: Cook Overrides
Settings.Description: Settings for audio cook overrides.

Settings.Name: Spatialization Plugin
Settings.Description: Select spatialization plugin: Built-In, Resonance Audio, Other.

Settings.Name: Reverb Plugin
Settings.Description: Select reverb plugin: Built-In, Resonance Audio, Other.

Settings.Name: Occlusion Plugin
Settings.Description: Select occlusion plugin: Built-In, Other.

Settings.Name: Sound Cue Cook Quality
Settings.Description: Quality level to cook SoundCues at.

Settings.Name: Override Compression Times
Settings.Description: Override Sound Group compression times.

Settings.Name: Duration Threshold
Settings.Description: Fully decompress sounds under this threshold.

Settings.Name: Maximum Branches on Random SoundCue Nodes
Settings.Description: Preload only this number of branches on random Sound Cues.

Settings.Name: Quality Index for Sound Cues
Settings.Description: Override quality index for Sound Cues.

Settings.Name: Resample for Device
Settings.Description: Enable audio resampling for this platform.

Settings.Name: Compression Quality Modifier
Settings.Description: Scale all compression qualities for this platform.

Settings.Name: Stream Caching
Settings.Description: Settings for stream caching.

Settings.Name: Resampling Quality
Settings.Description: Settings for resampling quality.

Settings.Name: Max Cache Size (KB)
Settings.Description: Max memory for audio cache.

Settings.Name: Max Chunk Size Override (KB)
Settings.Description: Override max chunk size for stream caching.

Settings.Name: Max Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Maximum sample rate for resampling.

Settings.Name: High Sample Rate
Settings.Description: High sample rate for resampling.

Settings.Name: Medium Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Medium sample rate for resampling.

Settings.Name: Low Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Low sample rate for resampling.

Settings.Name: Min Sample Rate
Settings.Description: Minimum sample rate for resampling.
